dialog.speaker: Caleb_Herrick (Male)
dialog.utterance: Got an update for us? We can't afford to sit this out for too much longer. Know what I mean.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Velma was embezzling from MSI. She's agreed to up your wages in exchange for my silence.

dialog.speaker: Caleb_Herrick (Male)
dialog.utterance: Well, I'll be a raptidon's dinner. Reckon I ought to listen to gossip more often!

dialog.speaker: Caleb_Herrick (Male)
dialog.utterance: Here, take this as compensation. It ain't a lot, but I hope it shows how much we appreciate all you've done.

dialog.speaker: Caleb_Herrick (Male)
dialog.utterance: Now, me and my friends here better get back to work. Before Velma blows a fuse!

dialog.speaker: Caleb_Herrick (Male)
dialog.utterance: How'd you manage that? Wait. Never mind. If I question it, it'll turn out to not be true. 'Sides, I'd never follow how you got Velma to part ways with a bit cart of her own accord.
